minuwangoda adhyapana kalapayata ayath ganihimulla kanitu widuhale sisu sisuwiyan nomathiwima nisa kalak thisse wasa dama thibiyadi basnahira palath pradhana amathi prasanna ranathunga mahathage madihathwima matha nawatha pragathiya kara gena eemata samathwi atha.meyin wasara siyayakata pamana pera parama winynyartha bauddha samagama yatathe me widyalaya aarambhakara atha.1995 di pasala wasa dama aththe daruwan nomathi nisaweni.2010 di isuru pasal wyapruthiya yatathe dewalapola aananda maha widyalaya isuru pasalak kirimedi iwath kerena prathamika anshaya awata pasal walata (balabowa, watinapaha,) yomu kirimata adhyapana baladharin kriya kalaha.ema awasthawedi aananda widyaliya aadi sisu sangamaya pradhana amathiwaraya magin me widuhalata prathamika anshaya nawatha arambaimata katayuthu keleya.pasugiya wasare pebarawari 8 dina lamayin 72k samanga palamuwana shreniya dewalapola aananda widyalayen me pasalata gena prathamika ansha bhara guruthumiya wu ke.
